Description

Team of students in game development at Cnam-Enjmin, we made the game It's Paper Guy!.

History

The team was originally formed as a student team for the final project of the first year of our Master's Degree at Cnam-Enjmin, from which It's Paper Guy! was created. We are currently in our second year of Master's Degree ; what happens next of the team is yet to be decided!
